fieldDescription: Step distance in pixels each press of a movement key will move the cursor.
When pressing and holding a directional key the step distance increases by this multiplier (roughly) each frame.
The maximum multiplier applied to the step distance when holding down a directional key.
Key to move cursor [left]. Defaults to [Left Arrow Key].
Key to move cursor [right]. Defaults to [Right Arrow Key].
Key to move cursor [up]. Defaults to [Down Arrow Key].
Key to move cursor [down]. Defaults to [Up Arrow Key].
Key to click the [left mouse button]. Defaults to [F1].
Alternative key to click the [left mouse button]. Defaults to [Delete].
Key to click the [left mouse button]. Defaults to [F2].
Alternative key to click the [right mouse button]. Defaults to [End].
Key to [scroll up or zoom in] depending on context. Defaults to [Page Up].
Key to [scroll down or zoom out] depending on context. Defaults to [Page Down].
Double tap this key to [switch] between fake input from this mod and regular mouse input. Defaults to [Left Shift].
Alternative key to double tap to [switch] between fake input from this mod and regular mouse input. Defaults to [Right Shift]..
